title: Mastery Learning Strategies for Designing Hierarchical Structures in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundation in basic scientific theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Environment where learners access content anytime/anywhere via mobile devices and receive continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Participants can analyze learning hierarchy models to design optimal instructional sequences.
Participants can establish personalized assessment strategies aligned with learners' proficiency levels following mastery learning principles.
Simulation-based tools can be used to predict and compare the effectiveness of various learning sequences
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
